SEARCH
Package pojos

Class Client

java.lang.Object
pojos.Client
public class Client extends Object
Represents a patient in the system. Stores personal information, physical data, medical history records and the doctor assigned.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Client()
    Creates an empty Client instance.

    Creates a Client with all its fields.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client()
      Creates an empty Client instance.

    • Client

      public Client(int clientId, String name, String surname, LocalDate dob, String mail, Sex sex, List<MedicalHistory> medicalHistory, double weight, double height, int doctorId, int userId)
      Creates a Client with all its fields.
      Parameters:
      clientId - unique ID of the client
      name - patient's name
      surname - patient's surname
      dob - date of birth
      mail - email address
      sex - biological sex
      medicalHistory - list with the patient's medical history
      weight - weight in kg
      height - height in meters
      doctorId - assigned doctor ID
      userId - user account ID
